caption.p: A histogram (a) of the ratio of summit metabolic capacity (M sum) to estimated metabolic rate at the cold range boundary (MR CRB) suggests the high energetic demands of thermoregulation. We examine interspecific variation in the ratio (MR CRB/M sum) by plotting the observed temperatures at the cold range boundaries against the physiological temperature limit corresponding to MR CRB = 0.7 M sum (b). We depict mammals (filled circles) and birds (hollow circles), mass (symbol size), and use of torpor or hibernation (color, 1 indicates use).
